"inthedarkplace <inthedarkplace@...>" <inthedarkplace@...> writes:

> http://artificial-philosopher.blog-city.com/readblog.cfm?BID=17023
>
> A thorough explanation of why a REST solution is the best solution to
> the identity dilemma.
>
> I'd like to hear others thoughts on this.

After this quote I stopped reading:

"You're never be completely certain that the spouse who arrives at
your home in the evening is the very same person you sent off with a
kiss in the morning."

Yeah right,

Berend. (-:
